FLIGHT.MONTH: Free Covid-19 Test for Indians At Dubai Intrnational Airport.
FLIGHT.JAN: Must Thermal Screeing of passengers at the Airport.
FLIGHT.FEB: All passengers must sign up for the Covid-19 DXB app.
FLIGHT.APR: Tourist must have international medical travel insurance.

SAFETY.l: Wearing Glove and Masks is must in public.
SAFETY.o: Physical Distancing of 2 metres is must.

RULES.s: If the person shows Covid-19 symptoms, then the test will be done for free.
RULES.w: Regular sterialisation and cleaning of public areas.
RULES.a: Hand sanitizers available for all at public places.
RULES.d: Isolators between taxi driver and passengers.
RULES.e: Not more than 3 people allowed in the car including the taxi-driver.

RESTRICTIONS.p: Not all are allowed to exit or enter UAE on their will. Permission must be taken online from the embassy first before taking flight.
RESTRICTIONS.o: Aged people are advised not to travel.
